source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Programmable Google Search Engine for Recruiters

visible_instructors.job_title: Global Talent Acquisition Leader and Coach at RecruitOn

items.headline: Google CSE, Xray Search, Social Media Search, Boolean Search, Linkedin Search
objectives_summary: Simplify XRAY search
Create Customised search engine for Linkedin and other Social networks
Create complex boolean string behind the scene and use it whenever required

items.title: Unconscious Bias in the Workplace: UB Training Exercises
items.headline: Focused on unconscious bias training exercises and practical activities.
objectives_summary: Differentiate between bias, prejudice, and discrimination
Be able to apply multiple explanations/lenses when discussing unconscious bias
Be able to apply these explanations to create activities to combat/reduce bias in the short-term

items.title: Master Basic Strategic Thinking and Problem Solving Skills
items.headline: A short, sharp course to tackling life’s biggest challenges: Understanding ourselves and making the right choices.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make better decisions and plan strategically
Use the models to resolve conflicts and deliver great feedback
Conduct a product analysis

items.title: The Basics of Coaching
items.headline: A short crash course in the essential skills of the coaching conversation and relationship
objectives_summary: Define what coaching is and situate it as a helping profession.
Explain what the essential competencies and attitudes of a coach entails.
Identify the approach coaches takes to a conversation.

items.headline: Overcome the barriers & challenges of virtual team management & Implement the best practice!

You will learn how to run productive meetings (virtual meetings included)?

items.title: Job Descriptions

items.headline: How To Target And Attract High-Quality Recruits
objectives_summary: Learn the many purposes a job description fulfils at an organisation.
How to structure and write a job description using the appropriate verbiage.
What to avoid in your job descriptions from both legal and ethical standpoints.

visible_instructors.title: Alex Genadinik
visible_instructors.job_title: Business, Entrepreneurship, SEO, Marketing, Amazon, YouTube

items.headline: Job hunting and job search, how to get a job, job interview preparation, remote jobs, (interviewing skills?)
objectives_summary: Establish yourself as a top candidate in the phone screen interview
Get scripts and templates for answering every question correctly

items.title: How To Write An Outstanding Resume
items.headline: Learn how to write a professional high-quality resume that will attract recruiters and help you book more interviews!
objectives_summary: Write a high quality resume according to recruiters' standards.
Increase your chances of getting an interview!
Present yourself as a valuable candidate.

objectives_summary: Real work experience as an HR Assistant
New-hire Onboarding
I-9 Processing

items.headline: IT recruiting for IT recruiter and IT recruitment specialists: Linkedin, Facebook recruitment, ATS, Interview management
objectives_summary: What are the steps of the recruitment process
How to create a bullet-proof selection process
How to source and attract great applicants

items.title: Organization Development (OD): The Diagnostic Phase

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course examines the tasks and skills required for the diagnostic phase of the OD cycle.
objectives_summary: Explore the diagnostic phase of Organization Development (OD), its links to evaluation processes and how, before such a journey begins, the OD practitioner should start with the end in mind.
Identify the types of data needed, data collection methods, and data analysis.
Discover methods of data feedback and action planning.

items.title: Develop an Employee Engagement Program
items.headline: Learn how to develop an employee engagement program and survey
objectives_summary: Developing/selecting employee engagement surveys
Stages of the employee engagement process
Assess levels of engagement within an organization

items.title: Self Evaluation Assignment course for HR (0-10Yrs Exp) India

visible_instructors.title: Milan Surana
visible_instructors.name: Milan
visible_instructors.job_title: Sr.HR Trainer at Metier HR Services & HR Practical Trainings

items.headline: 40 Min self evaluation course will help us in understanding, Where we stand in terms of practical knowledge & skills
objectives_summary: Most of the time, As an HR professionals during interview we let interviewers judge us in terms of knowledge & skills . This ultra short course will help students to self evaluate themselves on different HR Functions &  help them to understand where they stand in terms of knowledge in highly competitive HR job market

items.title: Organisation structure , Bands and Grades Structures

visible_instructors.name: Rajiv
visible_instructors.title: Rajiv Misra
visible_instructors.job_title: HR consultant with over 15 years of work experience

items.headline: Why your company need HR processes and systems, the need for HR policies, Organisation structure , Grades and Bands
objectives_summary: Will understand the need for having good HR processes and how it can help the company improve productivity and profitability
What is an organisation structure and how to set it up for your company
What are Bands and Grades and how to frame the bands and grades structure for your company

HR Foundational Knowledge areas and SHRM® Behavioral Competencies required for the exam
How to gain effective test-taking skills with quizzes and practice test
